page.title: 13Travel To Work From The Area
page.content: A general survey of people's transport to work was conducted. These are the results. 33% work in the immediate area, 8% work in neighbouring villages, 13% work in the Northwich area, 24% work in other Cheshire towns, 10% work in Liverpool or Merseyside, 10% work in Greater Manchester, 1% work abroad. Many of those employed in the Northwich or Runcorn or Macclesfield area work for the chemical industry (I.C.I.) One person is an artist in Rome and travels there by bus. Only 2% use public transport. One man travels to work by tractor.
